messages.subject: 1to5.net pre-babelled+zipped
messages.msgSnippet: I finally finished babelfishing all 52 of 1to5.net s pages...all files are in Microsoft word format and many files have retained the original look of the
messages.messageBody:
I finally finished babelfishing all 52 of 1to5.net's pages...all files
are in Microsoft word format and many files have retained the original
look of the page...as well as the pics...once you download the files
you may have to rename them.

Keep in mind that 3-hajime.com seems to have even more info however
the fish found it easier to translate 1to5.net. In the future I hope
to babel all of 3-hajime's pages and store them offline for reference
as well. And I don't need to warn you about how the fish warp's the
Japanese language---however many of 1to5.net's pages are easier to
understand than 3-hajime it depends on how the webmaster writes.

My purpose for doing this is
1) 1to5.net is currently experiencing server downtime and many pages
will result in messages like "document contains no data or server
cannot be found"
2) It is very very painful to keep logging onto the net and
babelfishing the same pages for just a tiny bit of info

I zipped all 52 pages of 1to5.net
the file size is 775 kb
http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3
password: makoto
filename:1to5

[please] retain files for private use only as reference
I'm only doing this to save us some time and headaches when using the
fish...and yes, I have also tried to contact the owner of 1to5.net to
inform her that I have been referencing her site on shinsengumimb.com
and here as well.
